text: Van Andel Arena is an arena in the Heartside district of Grand Rapids, Michigan, United States. More than five million people visited in its first five years. It is the home of the Grand Rapids Griffins of the American Hockey League, the Grand Rapids Gold of the NBA G League and the Grand Rapids Rise of the Pro Volleyball Federation. Van Andel Arena is the fourth-largest arena in Michigan. It is the largest arena in West Michigan. There are seats for 10,834 for ice hockey games and up to 13,184 seats for concerts. == References == == Other websites == * Official website * Grand Rapids Griffins * Grand Rapids Gold Category:Coordinates on Wikidata Category:Pages using gadget WikiMiniAtlas Category:Infobox mapframe without OSM relation ID on Wikidata Category:Sports buildings in the United States
title: Van Andel Arena
